title: Installation failed on Ubuntu 18.04
body:
**Installation procedure followed**
1. conda create -n dlc_env python=3.6
2. source activate dlc_env
3. pip install deeplabcut
4. pip install https://extras.wxpython.org/wxPython4/extras/linux/gtk3/ubuntu-16.04/wxPython-4.0.3-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
5. pip install --ignore-installed tensorflow==1.10

The last operation throws the following error:

`deeplabcut 2.0.0.dev5 has requirement wheel==0.31.1, but you'll have wheel 0.32.3 which is incompatible.`

Afterwards, my attempt to run python and import deeplabcut is greeted by

```
Python 3.6.7 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Oct 23 2018, 19:16:44) 
[GCC 7.3.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import deeplabcut
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/opt/anaconda3/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/__init__.py", line 25, in <module>
    from deeplabcut import generate_training_dataset
  File "/opt/anaconda3/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/__init__.py", line 15, in <module>
    from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.auxfun_drag_label import *    
  File "/opt/anaconda3/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/auxfun_drag_label.py", line 18, in <module>
    import wx
  File "/opt/anaconda3/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wx/__init__.py", line 17, in <module>
    from wx.core import *
  File "/opt/anaconda3/envs/dlc_env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wx/core.py", line 12, in <module>
    from ._core import *
ImportError: libpng12.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```
